name: Taringa! for Jetpack
author: Elio Rivero

sections.description:
This is an extension for the Jetpack plugin: it extends the Sharing allowing to share a post, page, product or any custom post type to Taringa!

Jetpack is a a popular WordPress plugin which allows your site to include Sharing buttons, and lots of other cools features.

Taringa! is the biggest Social Network in Latin America with more than 60M monthly unique visitors.

This project was developed during the Media Party 2016 Hackaton in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

Thanks to Gino Cingolani and Nicol치s Cohen, product manager and CTO of Taringa! respectively. Thanks to Adriel Z치rate for the help with the icons.

Contributing

Contributions and suggestions are received at the plugin repo on GitHub.
sections.installation:
1. Install Jetpack from their site by typing in your site address.

Alternatively install Jetpack via the plugin directory, or by uploading the files manually to your server. After activating Jetpack, connect to WordPress.com to enable the Jetpack features.

If you need additional help read our detailed instructions (including a video walkthrough).

  1. Activate the Sharing module.

  2. Install this plugin. You can search for it in the WP Admin area going to Plugins > Add New.

  3. Once it’s installed, activate it and go to Settings > Sharing to configure the button.
sections.faq:
How do I contribute to this plugin?

Contributions are welcome at the plugin repo on GitHub.

short_description: Extends Jetpack's Sharing feature adding a button to share a post to Taringa!
